channel.title: My Progress
channel.description:
Seeing as this section is starting to get less and less attention, I've decided to create a well-designed topic for my account goals, progress, and achievements.

item.description:

not really. didn’t have a stable computer to play. i just bought a new one for school, and it’s capable of playing the game. so i decided i’ll play again as much as i can.

also, i’m back guys. :][/quote]

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

@lothy don’t really stock on rares because they’re gonna come out on holidays anyway. masks were given to me

as for today’s updates (too lazy to edit main topic because I’m on phone, but I did witches house. attempted to do contact but fell through a trap and got buttfucked by scarabars mages or whatever the hell they’re called. lost a few hundred k.

will probably do quests this week as I have a very flexible schedule for the next few days.
hopefully getting 60 defence the next few days.

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Nice effort. No phats though? If you ever get into training range, consider fire giants. They’ll bolster the number of rune arrows you have (plus they’re decent experience). Just make sure you’re 60+ or 70+ first though.

Read full topic

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:

[quote=“Arcik, post:38, topic:530955”]I’d play but I know exactly what I’m doing in game which has just taken the fun out for me :([/quote]my original account, I got to like level 70 in 2006-2007 and lost interest in the game. I still try to remember the name and password but no luck. last remember quest was dragon slayer. i know it would have a massive bank in eoc though. my second main account I only remember getting to do lost city before losing interest.

never really gotten far into the game so I decided to do it now

[quote=“Lothy, post:37, topic:530955”]It must be relieving to see more and more green in the quest list.

Also, bank pic?[/quote]will post one tonight after work.

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:29, topic:530955”]nice progress, I played when it first came out, made a fair bit of cash (like 300K) and never renewed my membership, I might play again, but who knows[/quote]i find it very fun, and if you did play - i’d keep you company! it isn’t too hard to make cash in the game, but some of it isn’t very easy.

updates so far: paused from questing for a bit of time to train, go 60 attack, and obtained Master White Knight rank for the white armours.
obtained a good bit of wealth from flipping more rares/selling white armor & items.

combat plans: get 60 defence, then 60 strength. get 55 magic, then 50 range.
as for quests, ive made a list of quests i can currently complete with the rewards for doing so.

Contact!

  • 1 Quest Point
  • 7,000 Thieving XP,
  • 7,000 XP lamp (for Combat Skills)
  • Keris
  • Access to bank in Sophanem

Creature of Fenkenstrain

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 1,000 Thieving XP
  • Ring of Charos
  • Access to Morytania Agility Arena

Death Plateau

  • 1 Quest Point
  • 3,000 Attack XP
  • Steel Claws
  • Ability to make Claws and wear Climbing Boots

Fairy Tale Part I - Growing Pains

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 1,000 Magic XP
  • 2,000 Attack XP
  • 3,500 Farming XP

The Fremennik Trials

  • 3 Quest Points
  • 2,800 Agility XP
  • 2,800 Attack XP
  • 2,800 Crafting XP
  • 2,800 Defence XP
  • 2,800 Fishing XP
  • 2,800 Fletching XP
  • 2,800 Hitpoints XP
  • 2,800 Strength XP
  • 2,800 Thieving XP
  • 2,800 Woodcutting XP
  • Access to Rellekka’s facilities

Ghosts Ahoy

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 2,400 Prayer XP
  • Ectophial
  • Ability to Teleport to the Ectofuntus using your Ectophial
  • Access to Port Phasmatys free of charge

The Golem

  • 1 Quest Point
  • 1,000 Crafting XP
  • 1,000 Thieving XP
  • Access to Uzer by the Magic Carpet outside Shantay Pass
  • Optional reward of 2 Cut Sapphires, 2 Cut Emeralds and 2 Cut Rubies

Haunted Mine

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 22,000 Strength XP
  • Salve Amulet

Hazeel Cult

  • 1 Quest Point
  • 1,500 Thieving XP
  • 2,000GP

Horror from the Deep

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 4,662 Magic XP
  • 4,662 Ranged XP
  • 4,662 Strength XP
  • Prayer Book

Rat Catchers

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 4500 Thieving XP
  • Access to Rat Pits

Recipe for Disaster

  • 1 Quest Point

Shades of Mort’ton

  • 3 Quest Points
  • 2,000 Crafting XP
  • 2,000 Herblore XP
  • Access to the Shade Tombs

Spirits of the Elid

  • 2 Quest Points
  • 8,000 Prayer XP
  • 1,000 Thieving XP
  • 1,000 Magic XP
  • Ability to use the Shrine in Nardah to restore Prayer and boost Hitpoints

A Tail of Two Cats

  • 2 Quest Points
  • Two Antique Lamps (2,500 XP each)
  • Mouse Toy

Witch’s House

  • 4 Quest Points
  • 6,325 Hitpoints XP

not sure in which order i will do these, but i hope to achieve all, or at least most of these, within the next week or two.

Read full topic

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

nice progress, I played when it first came out, made a fair bit of cash (like 300K) and never renewed my membership, I might play again, but who knows. I’m just really lazy and don’t feel like doing anything for myself.

Read full topic

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

whilst laying in bed, i browse quest guides on my phone and order them in series with how easy they will be, whether i have the requirements, and what items i need. i then bulk up on items for all the quests, and go at them as fast as possible.

i am also now done with tourist trap. it gave me exactly 36 agility, as needed.

I get off work around 8:30 pm est tonight, will complete one small favour tonight. debating whether I should use the lamps for 20k agility boost, or save them for another stat.

completed the quest, used both lamps on agility. need 42 -> 56 before i can do regicide

Read full topic

Looks good, I don’t know where you can find the time to do so many quests in one day, though.

item.title: My Progress
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i edited the post above yours, not sure if you’ve seen it.
completed temple of ikov and watchtower. gave me 40 magic from the second quest.
nearly done with tourist trap now, just have to get ana in the barrel.

plan to use both lamps on agility for the boost to be able to do one small favour.

oh yes, currently 126 qps; will be 128 after this quest.

Read full topic
